title: Pixel 4XL wireless charging has stopped working after the March update.
content:
I did the update this morning and both of my wireless chargers display on the phone" Realign phone to charge wirelessly" I have restarted but that is about all I can think of. I have a very thin case which I took off, no change. Both have worked fine since I bought them and the only thing that has changed is this update. I looked around but couldn't find anyone anywhere with the same problem.

EDIT: Found this Reddit thread https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/lyr50v/anyone_elses_4xl_have_problems_with_wireless/
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
